patthana16.12:4.1: Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.12:4.2: Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.12:4.3: Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.12:4.5: Hetuyā ekūnavīsati, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate ekūnavīsati.
patthana16.12:5.1: Kusalaṃ kenaci naviññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nakenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.12:5.2: Kusalaṃ kenaci naviññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nakenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.12:5.3: Kusalaṃ kenaci naviññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nakenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.12:6.1: Hetuyā ekūnavīsati, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate ekūnavīsati.
patthana16.12:6.6: (Etena upāyena kenaci naviññeyye ekūnavīsati pañhā kātabbā.)
